Any of you who have a beef with Israel had better consider this. When Adolf Hitler and his Third Reich systematically murdered countless millions, including over six million Jews, he was doing so not because of "economic concerns" but because of his percieved demented vision of "racial superiority". I have become increasingly interested in the Holocaust because we are beginning to see the exact same thing today.

Yes we are,
 
 THe number of people who seem to wish death and destruction on Arabs and muslims, due to their own percieved superiority is certainly starting to rival the bigotted visions of Hitler
I'm referring specifically to the Jewish race. The maniacs in the ME want nothing more than the annihilation of Israel and the Jews.
That doesn't change any wrongdoing of Israel.
You mean national defence? Israel has a right to exist!

Bassman, when the nazis killed the jews it was on the basis of racial superiority. The foudnation of the holocaust was eugenics.
 
 Israel certainly has the right to exist. Nobody is threatening their existance. Those thousands of lebanese civilians that Israel recently blew up also had a right to exist. Now israel wants hezbollah disarmed so NEXT TIME israel gets a wild hair to blow up stuff in Lebanon, they can do so without fear of resistance.
 
 Face it, Bassman, the Israelis are in violation of more UN resolutions than any other country. THEYT have violated EVERY treaty and ceasfire they have ever signed. Hell, they just violated a treaty with the US that said they could not use cluster bombs on civilians. 
 
 The US recently invaded Iraq, killing over 100,000 civilians in the process and destabilizing the entire nation because some of us believed that our culture was so superior to the Arab culture that it was our duty to impose it on them at the point of a gun. If you want to compare somebody to the nazis without looking like an idiot, you are picking the wrong guys.
On your first point that is correct. And that is what I'm seeing today. Antisemitism is as old as the blood feud between Issac and his descendants and Ishmael and his descendants.

None of us here, with the exception of he-who-must-not-be-named (emoticon_xangel ), have voiced our issues with Israel on the basis of Antisemitism.
 
 This is an interesting comment coming from someone who would no doubt be cussing up a storm if anyone ever accused him of having racist motivations on an issue.

Why do people always go back to the secong world war to justify anything Israel does in the present. That was then this is now I do not see the conection or relevance to actions that are carried outin the present. In truth both sides are as bad as each other. It is just thet Israel hides behind anti semitism and the holocost as a blanket justification for what they do.

Aaaah, nice to see that someone has played the old "Anti-Semitism"-card again. It's been a while since I've seen that one on the forum.
 
 Always makes me laugh to see Israelis and their supporters cry "Anti-Semitism!" when Israel is the most racist and anti-semetic state on the planet.
 
 Thanks Bassman, it's people like you who make me feel superior to others and who give me that warm fuzzy feeling inside.
 
 Now take this star spangled banner and go wave it in front of your house, while at the same time shouting "USA" and "freedom".

As the Israeli people are semitic in origin how are they now ant-semitic ?
 
 Imagine a race of people who for centuries had fought to hold their position and home;
 
 who were dispersed across the face of the world by superior military might,
 
 who nevertheless kept their racial origins intact.
 
 Who were persecuted by everyone at worst and at best were allowed to live on a tolerated/useful basis, 
 
 who suffered progroms at the whims of their overlords,
 
 who nevertheless when every man's hand was against them, kept going. 
 
 Surviving because there was an occasional oasis of enlightenment
 
 Who suffered one of the worst massacres known and still kept going.
 
 Who were finally granted permission to return to their home after centuries
 
 WHO ARE NOW DETERMINED NEVER TO BE DRIVEN OFF AGAIN
 
 When you can understand that and associate that with the outpourings of their foes, then perhaps you can appreciate Israel's attitudes.
 
 Would you wholly trust anyone ?

Israel does have the right to exist but to defend everyting it does by the term self defense is wrong. Each action that they take that directly or in-directly effects another countries civilians or land has to be judged on it own merit. Anti semitism does not really matter in the Middle east situation at present, only the facts and statistics on the situation. The holocast was bad, but come on that was over 60 years ago now and is in the far distant past. It feels like I am banging my head against a brick wall when people start brining antisemitism in to the argument (just a way of justifying what Isreal does).:xbanghead :xbanghead

I hope you meant 'past' rather than 'future' or are you forseeing some terrible event in the future.
 
 Anti-semitism (referring specifically to Israel seems to be alive and well if the rantings of various ME leaders are to be believed. I put in the caveat as often these remarks are made just to put down markers and work from there.
 
 When such grievous events have happened in all of history and the most grievous of all within living memory then it is extremely hard to forget.

Sorry made a mistake I did mean past and not future - have edited the mistake to show past instead of future. With anti-semitism I just find it gets in the way of dealing with the facts and having claritiy when balancing out the rights and wrong of a situation.
